medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical pain migrating to right lower quadrant (RLQ) with fevers and anorexia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day prior to admission, starting as periumbilical pain that migrated to the RLQ. The patient experienced fevers and anorexia. There was no prior history of similar symptoms, and the patient otherwise described a normal state of health.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (poorly controlled), Hyperlipidemia (HLD), Hypertension (HTN), Chronic Hepatitis B.
